languages.text: "Выдайте блюстителям с моего корабля тех, кто выкрикивал нечестивые речи — их казнят, а остальные смогут присоединиться к команде корабля".

traits.locale_text: "Даю вам час, чтобы выдать страже моего корабля тех, кто выкрикивал нечестивые речи. Их казнят, остальные могут присоединиться к команде корабля".

languages.text: "All those who shouted profanities are to be handed over to the enforcers on my ship — they will be executed. The rest may join my ship's crew."
languages.original_text: "Выдайте блюстителям с моего корабля тех, кто выкрикивал нечестивые речи — их казнят, а остальные смогут присоединиться к команде корабля".

traits.locale_text: "I give you one hour to hand the ones who were shouting profanities over to the guards on my ship. They will be executed, the rest may join my ship's crew."
"I give you one hour to hand the ones who were shouting profanities over to the guards on my ship. They will be executed, the rest may join my ship's crew."
"All those who shouted profanities are to be handed over to the guards on my ship — they will be executed. The rest may join my ship's crew."
"All those who shouted profanities are to be handed over to the guards on my ship — they will be executed. The rest may join my ship's crew."
"All those who shouted profanities are to be handed over to the enforcers on my ship — they will be executed. The rest may join my ship's crew."

languages.text: 「冒涜的な言葉を叫んだ者たちは全員、私の船の執行官に引き渡され、処刑される。残りの者は我が船のクルーとして乗船しろ」
languages.original_text: "All those who shouted profanities are to be handed over to the enforcers on my ship — they will be executed. The rest may join my ship's crew."

traits.locale_text: 「冒涜的な言葉を叫んだ者たちは全員、私の船の執行官に引き渡され、処刑される。残りの者は我が船のクルーとして乗船しろ」

languages.text: “那些口吐污言秽语的人，我都会交给船上的执法者。那些人会被处决，剩下的人可以成为我的船员。”
languages.original_text: "All those who shouted profanities are to be handed over to the enforcers on my ship — they will be executed. The rest may join my ship's crew."

traits.locale_text: “那些口吐污言秽语的人，我都会交给船上的镇压者。那些人会被处决，剩下的人可以成为我的船员。”

languages.text: «Los que se han dedicado a insultar pasarán a manos del personal de seguridad de mi nave... para su ejecución. El resto puede unirse a mi tripulación».
languages.original_text: "All those who shouted profanities are to be handed over to the enforcers on my ship — they will be executed. The rest may join my ship's crew."

traits.locale_text: «Los que se han dedicado a insultar pasarán a manos del personal de seguridad de mi nave... para su ejecución. El resto puede unirse a mi tripulación».

languages.text: « Tous ceux qui ont proféré des insultes doivent être livrés aux prévôts sur mon vaisseau, où ils seront exécutés. Quant aux autres, ils rejoindront mon équipage. »
languages.original_text: "All those who shouted profanities are to be handed over to the enforcers on my ship — they will be executed. The rest may join my ship's crew."

traits.locale_text: « Tous ceux qui ont proféré des insultes doivent être livrés aux prévôts sur mon vaisseau, où ils seront exécutés. Quant aux autres, ils rejoindront mon équipage. »

languages.text: "Alle, die Gottlosigkeiten gerufen haben, müssen den Enforcers auf meinem Schiff übergeben werden – sie werden hingerichtet. Der Rest kann sich der Crew meines Schiffs anschließen."
languages.original_text: "All those who shouted profanities are to be handed over to the enforcers on my ship — they will be executed. The rest may join my ship's crew."

traits.locale_text: "Alle, die Gottlosigkeiten gerufen haben, müssen den Enforcers auf meinem Schiff übergeben werden – sie werden hingerichtet. Der Rest kann sich der Crew meines Schiffs anschließen."

languages.text: "Hakaret edenler, gemimdeki infazcılara teslim edilip idam edilecekler. Geri kalanlar mürettebatıma katılabilir."
languages.original_text: "All those who shouted profanities are to be handed over to the enforcers on my ship — they will be executed. The rest may join my ship's crew."

traits.locale_text: "Hakaret edenler, gemimdeki infazcılara teslim edilecek ve idam edilecekler. Geri kalanlar mürettebatıma katılabilir."
